-7'
SHOT 27.
Bumper to bumper traffic lines from the air
Stacks of war surplus
Hows of liberty ships in mothballs. - Now,
"if it works, it*s obsolete!8
i.e* reverse of applied knowledge...
crowded modem library shelves, supermarket
shelves, dissolving into electronic computer
our revels now are ended.
Check Camera III format.
These moveable types as I foretold you are
melted into aerial perspective.
H.M. ffcLuhan,
March 31Â»t/6o.
